headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast Surrenders Youth Leader to ICC
headline.main: Ivory Coast Surrenders Youth Leader to ICC

docs.snippet: The International Criminal Court says Ivory Coast authorities have surrendered to the court a former youth leader wanted on crimes against humanity charges linked to postelection violence....
docs.lead_paragraph: The International Criminal Court says Ivory Coast authorities have surrendered to the court a former youth leader wanted on crimes against humanity charges linked to postelection violence.

headline.print_headline: Pope Appoints Former Child Victim to Church Group on Sex Abuse
headline.main: Pope Appoints Former Child Victim to Church Group on Sex Abuse

docs.snippet: Pope Francis on Saturday named a woman molested by a priest as a child to be part of a core group to help the Catholic Church fight the clerical sexual abuse of minors that has haunted it for over two decades...
docs.lead_paragraph: Pope Francis on Saturday named a woman molested by a priest as a child to be part of a core group to help the Catholic Church fight the clerical sexual abuse of minors that has haunted it for over two decades

docs.snippet: On our way to patrimonial capitalism....
docs.abstract: On our way to patrimonial capitalism.

headline.print_headline: Libyan Official: US Navy Hands Oil Tanker to Libya
headline.main: Libyan Official: US Navy Hands Oil Tanker to Libya

docs.snippet: American sailors handed over control of a captured North Korean-flagged oil tanker to Libyan forces while in international waters Saturday, a spokesman for the Libyan navy said....
docs.lead_paragraph: American sailors handed over control of a captured North Korean-flagged oil tanker to Libyan forces while in international waters Saturday, a spokesman for the Libyan navy said.

headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka Hold Nerve to Beat South Africa in World T20
headline.main: Sri Lanka Hold Nerve to Beat South Africa in World T20

docs.snippet: Lasith Malinga and Nuwan Kulasekara held their nerve in the death overs with miserly fast bowling as Sri Lanka beat South Africa by five runs in their World Twenty20 opener at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium in Chittagong on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lasith Malinga and Nuwan Kulasekara held their nerve in the death overs with miserly fast bowling as Sri Lanka beat South Africa by five runs in their World Twenty20 opener at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium in Chittagong on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: 6.2 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Northern Chile, No Damage Reported
headline.main: 6.2 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Northern Chile, No Damage Reported

docs.snippet: A 6.2 magnitude earthquake struck the northern coast of Chile on Saturday, the U.S. Geological Survey said, but there were no immediate reports of damage or casualties....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 6.2 magnitude earthquake struck the northern coast of Chile on Saturday, the U.S. Geological Survey said, but there were no immediate reports of damage or casualties.

headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast Sends Gbagbo Ally to International Criminal Court
headline.main: Ivory Coast Sends Gbagbo Ally to International Criminal Court

docs.snippet: Ivory Coast transferred Charles Ble Goude, a youth leader and close ally of ex-president Laurent Gbagbo, to the International Criminal Court (ICC) on Saturday to face charges of crimes against humanity linked to a 2011 post-election civil war....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast transferred Charles Ble Goude, a youth leader and close ally of ex-president Laurent Gbagbo, to the International Criminal Court (ICC) on Saturday to face charges of crimes against humanity linked to a 2011 post-election civil war.

headline.print_headline: Georgian Prosecutors Summon Ex-President Saakashvili for Questioning
headline.main: Georgian Prosecutors Summon Ex-President Saakashvili for Questioning

docs.snippet: The Georgian prosecutor's office has summoned former president Mikheil Saakashvili for questioning about the poisoning death of a former prime minister and other cases amid a wave of charges and verdicts against former officials....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Georgian prosecutor's office has summoned former president Mikheil Saakashvili for questioning about the poisoning death of a former prime minister and other cases amid a wave of charges and verdicts against former officials.

headline.print_headline: Sri Lanka Beat South Africa by Five Runs in World T20
headline.main: Sri Lanka Beat South Africa by Five Runs in World T20

docs.snippet: Sri Lanka beat South Africa by five runs in their Group One super 10 match of the World Twenty20 at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium in Chittagong on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Sri Lanka beat South Africa by five runs in their Group One super 10 match of the World Twenty20 at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium in Chittagong on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Force Hold Out for Surprise Win Over Champions
headline.main: Force Hold Out for Surprise Win Over Champions

docs.snippet: Two tries from captain Matt Hodgson laid the platform for the Western Force as they upset defending champions Waikato Chiefs 18-15 in Perth on Saturday to end their 100 percent Super Rugby record this season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two tries from captain Matt Hodgson laid the platform for the Western Force as they upset defending champions Waikato Chiefs 18-15 in Perth on Saturday to end their 100 percent Super Rugby record this season.
